item.description: The United States on Monday launched its third crackdown in three years on China's semiconductor industry.

item.title: Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger ousted by board after disastrous underperformance
item.description: Intel announced Monday that CEO Pat Gelsinger has retired from the company, effective Dec. 1.
